Document: ## Soups and Stews -Vegetarian Chili = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Tomato +1 Chili + 10u water + 5u table salt for 10 seconds -Bungo Curry = Microwave 1 Bowl + 2 Bungo Fruit + 1 Chili + 5u water for 10 seconds -Heartburn Soup = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Tofu Slice + 1 Chili + 5u Vinegar + 5u Milk + 5u Cream for 10 seconds -Cheese Soup = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Cheese Wedge + 1 Potato + 5u Milk + 5u Flour + 5u Cream for10 seconds -Seed Soup = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Ambrosia Vulgaris + 1 Poppy Seeds + 1 wheat Seeds + 5u water + 5u Vinaigrette for 10 seconds -Tomato Soup= Microwave 1 Bowl + 2 Tomato + 10u water for 10 seconds -Stew = Microwave 1 Bowl + 3 Raw Cutlets + 1 Tomato + 1 Potato + 1 Carrot + 1 Eggplant + 1 Chantrelle Cluster + 10u water for 10 seconds -Oat Stew = Microwave 1 Bowl + 2 Carrots + 1 Potato + 5u water + 5u Oats for 10 seconds -Bean Stew = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Tin of Beans + 1 Cabbage + 1 Tomato +1 Onion + 1 Baked Corn + 5u water for 10 seconds -Fried Eggplant and Polenta = Microwave 1 Cheesey Porridge + 1 Eggplant + 2 Bread Slices + 1 Mozzarella + 5u tomato sauce for 10 seconds -Cornmeal Porridge = Microwave 1 Bowl + 10u Cornmeal + 10u water for 10 seconds -Cheesey Porridge = Microwave 1 Cornmeal Porridge + 1 Curd Cheese + 1 Cheese Wedge + 5u milk + 5u cream for 10 seconds -Oatmeal = Microwave 1 Bowl + 15u Oats + 10u water for 15 seconds -Bisque = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Tomato + 1 Chantrelle Cluster + 1 Raw Carp Fillet + 10u water for 10 seconds -Meatball Soup = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Meatball + 1 Carrot + 1 Potato + 10u water for 10 seconds -Nettle Soup = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Nettle + 1 Potato + 10u water + 6u egg for 10 seconds -Eyeball Soup = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Human Eyes + 1 Carrot + 1 Potato + 10u water for 10 seconds -French Onion Soup = Microwave 1 Bowl + 5 Onion Slices + 1 Cheese Wedge + 10u water for 10 seconds -Mushroom Soup = Microwave 1 Bowl + 2 Chantrelle Clusters + 5u water + 5u milk for 10 seconds -Wing Fang Chu = Microwave 1 Bowl + 2 Raw Xeno Cutlets + 5u Soy Sauce for 10 seconds -Wing Fang Chu = Microwave 1 Bowl + 2 Raw Spider Meat + 5u Soy Sauce for 10 seconds -Vegetable Soup = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Corn + 1 Carrot + 1 Potato + 1 Eggplant + 5u water for 10 seconds -Pea Soup = Microwave 1 Bowl + 2 Pea Pods + 10u water for 10 seconds -Monkey's Delight = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Banana + 1 Monkey Cube + 5u Flour + 1u Table Salt + 1u Pepper for 10 seconds -Clown's Tears = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Banana + Glass Shard + 10u water for 10 seconds -Clown's Tears = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Onion Slice + 1 Tomato + 1 Bike Horn for 15 seconds -Cotton Soup = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Eggplant + 1 Onion + 1 Carrot + 1 Baked Corn + 1 Cotton + 10u water for 10 seconds -Chili Con Carnival = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Chili + 1 Raw Cutlet + 1 Onion Slice + 1 Tomato + 1 Clown Shoes for 30 seconds -Hot Chili = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Chili + 1 Raw Cutlet + 1 Onion Slice + 1 Tomato for 20 seconds -Cold Chili = Microwave 1 Hot Chili + 5u Nitrogen for 5 seconds
